== Introduction ==

Terminal Server Client (tsclient) lets you connect to remote desktops using many different protocols. It has support for specific connection options including color depth, screen size, and motion blocking.

=== Features ===

* A panel applet to quickly launch saved profiles
* Similar look and functionality to the Microsoft client
* Compatibility with its file format
* Support for rdesktop 1.3, Xnest and VNC clients (*vncviewer)
